org.switchyard.component.common.composer

Class BaseMessageComposer<D extends BindingData>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.switchyard.component.common.composer.BaseMessageComposer<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - the type of binding data
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageComposer<D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CamelMessageComposer, HttpMessageComposer, IndexedRecordMessageComposer, JMSMessageComposer, MappedRecordMessageComposer, RESTEasyMessageComposer, SOAPMessageComposer, StreamableRecordMessageComposer

    public abstract class BaseMessageComposer<D extends BindingData>
extends Object
implements MessageComposer<D>
    Base class for MessageComposer.
    Author:
    David Ward <dward@jboss.org> (C) 2011 Red Hat Inc.
